Posts.EditableText:
Name: Hellboy (John)
Age: 66 this summer (19)

I guess I'm not exactly what you'd call a normal guy. I don't really know where I came from (and what I do know I don't like), my right hand is made of stone, and if I let 'em grow I have horns that put mideval paintings to shame. I'm an agent for the Burrow of Paranormal Research and Defense, and an honorary human. Or was, I quit the burrow and am currently on walking tour of Africa...nice place, I've always liked it here; but the Jumbies in the rural areas make the ones in Ireland look like mice. 

(I'm a college student, a potential computer science major, and an amatuer game creator.)
